prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon that has vibrant feathers and a cheerful demeanor.
Show me a flying Pokemon with sleek wings and a friendly expression.
Imagine a small Pokemon that can be found in urban areas, known for its agility.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a sparrow, with hints of orange and white in its plumage.
Generate a Normal/Flying type Pokemon that loves to perch on trees and chirp.
Make a cute Pokemon that evolves into something larger and more powerful.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of freedom and adventure.
